actions.label: Accept Fulfillment
actions.description: Allows any of the approvers to accept a given submission

actions.label: Issue And Contribute
actions.description: Create a new bounty and contribute tokens to the bounty.

actions.label: Drain Bounty
actions.description: Allows an issuer to drain the funds from the bounty.

actions.label: Replace Approvers
actions.description: Allows any of the issuers to replace the approvers of the bounty.

actions.label: Change Bounty Details
actions.description: Allows any of the issuers to change the bounty's details.

actions.label: Replace Issuers
actions.description: Allows any of the issuers to replace the issuers of the bounty

actions.label: Refund Contributions
actions.description: Allows users to refund their contributions in bulk.

actions.label: Allows users to contribute tokens to a given bounty.
actions.description: Contributing merits no privelages to administer the funds in the bounty or accept submissions. Contributions are refundable but only on the condition that the deadline has elapsed, and the bounty has not yet paid out any funds. All funds deposited in a bounty are at the mercy of a bounty's issuers and approvers.

actions.label: Change Deadline
actions.description: Allows any of the issuers to change the deadline the bounty.

actions.label: Change Bounty
actions.description: Allows any of the issuers to change the bounty.

fields.label: Issuer Id
fields.name: _issuerId
fields.placeholder: Index of issuer calling this action

actions.label: Fulfill And Accept
actions.description: Allows any of the approvers to both fulfill and accept a submission.
